article.headline: Detroit 68, Youngstown State 63
article.story: DETROIT (AP) -- Jon Goode scored a career-high 28 points Saturday to lead Detroit to its third straight win, a 68-63 victory over Youngstown State. Goode scored the Titans' last eight points, including the field goal that put Detroit ahead for good with 40 seconds to play. Quin Humphrey had 18 points to lead Youngstown State (5-9, 2-2 Horizon League). The Penguins had a chance to tie the game late, but Derrick Harris dribbled off his foot with 15 seconds to play. The Titans (9-8, 3-1) were without leading scorer Brandon Cotton, who missed the game after aggravating an injured left hand during Thursday's win over Loyola of Chicago. Goode dribbled around the right side to get open for the basket that put Detroit ahead 62-60. He made all six of his free throws in the final 30 seconds to keep the Titans in front. The win was Detroit's seventh in as many home games this season. The Penguins made nine of their first 12 field-goal attempts and led by as many as 14 points in the second half before Detroit rallied. A 14-4 run late in the period gave the Titans a five-point lead, but Humphrey made a 3-pointer and a pair of free throws to tie the game at 60 with a minute to play. Chuck Bailey added 15 points and Torvoris Baker had 10 for Detroit. Youngstown State also got 17 points from Keston Roberts and 11 from Domonique Crawford.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
